sentences.sContent: His mother and father are both doctors.
the relationship between mother and child
sentences.sCn: 母亲和孩子之间的关系

sentences.sContent: Mother said they’d met at university.
sentences.sCn: 母亲说他们是在大学里认识的。

sentences.sContent: If food is scarce, the mother will feed the smaller, weaker chicks.
sentences.sCn: 如果食物稀少，母禽就喂较小、较弱的幼禽。

sentences.sContent: ...But nobody greeted the daughter and mother when they arrived...
...A friend recently took her mother to visit an expensive assisted living/nursing home near my town...
...When one mother realized that cable TV was costing her $500 a year...
...The mother with a headache suffers and disturbs the family...
...One mother said that before her daughter was involved in this project...
...The author's mother taught him a valuable lesson by pointing out lots of flaws in his seemingly perfect essay...
...The author looks upon his mother as his most demanding and caring instructor...
...my mother and her red pen showed me how deeply flawed a flawless essay could be...
...My mother was well covered on this count...
...My mother said she would help me with my writing...

synos.tran: 母亲；大娘；女修道院院长
生下；养育；像母亲般关怀或照管

phrases.pCn: 伟大母亲（古代宗教神话中的女神）
n. 代孕母亲；替身母亲
职业妇女；职业母亲；工作母亲

words.tran: 母性；母亲身份；母亲们（总称）

trans.tranOther: a female parent of a child or animal
